Underweight: Focus on nutrient-dense foods to promote weight gain in a healthy way.
Include lean protein sources like chicken, fish, eggs, and legumes.
Incorporate healthy fats from sources like nuts, seeds, avocados, and olive oil.
Choose whole grains like brown rice, quinoa, and whole wheat bread.
Increase intake of fruits and vegetables for vitamins and minerals.
Opt for balanced snacks between meals to increase calorie intake.

NormalWeight: Maintain a balanced diet with a mix of carbohydrates, proteins, and healthy fats.
Emphasize whole foods such as lean meats, whole grains, fruits, and vegetables.
Control portion sizes to avoid overeating.
Include sources of fiber like whole grains, legumes, and vegetables.
Stay hydrated with water throughout the day.
Choose healthy snacks like yogurt, nuts, and fresh fruit.

Overweight: Focus on portion control and reducing calorie intake.
Choose lean protein sources like poultry, fish, tofu, and beans.
Limit consumption of sugary snacks, sugary beverages, and processed foods.
Include whole grains for sustained energy and fiber.
Increase vegetable intake to help with satiety.
Consider reducing portion sizes and avoiding late-night eating.

Obesity: Work with a registered dietitian or healthcare professional to develop a personalized plan.
Aim for a calorie deficit to promote weight loss.
Prioritize lean protein to preserve muscle mass.
Choose complex carbohydrates to regulate blood sugar levels.
Incorporate healthy fats in moderation for satiety.
Include plenty of vegetables for vitamins, minerals, and fiber.
Avoid highly processed foods, sugary snacks, and sweetened beverages.

coaches.approach: Holistic approach to health, focusing on balanced nutrition and Diet

products.title: Weight Bench - All-in-One
products.description: Product dimensions: - Length: 141 cm - Width: 51 cm - Height: 41 cm - Weight: 19.3 kg This product is delivered in a box that: - measures 118 cm x 26 cm x 44 cm - weighs 22 kg. The 900 bench has been designed to have 7 different backrest angles so that you can work different muscle groups. The inclined position targets the upper pecs, while the declined position focuses on the lower pecs. The vertical position is for training your shoulders. - Bench press (0°) - Incline bench press at 15°, 30°, 45°, 60° - Military press at 80° - Declined bench press at -15° - CrunchesThe sky's the limit!

reviews.name: Alexandra Brown
reviews.comment: Versatile bench for various exercises. Love it!

reviews.name: John Smith
reviews.comment: Sturdy build, easy to adjust. Great investment.

reviews.name: Emily Johnson
reviews.comment: Uncomfortable padding, disappointed.

products.title: Running Shoes - Performance Plus
products.description: Flexible, lightweight EVA foam to absorb shock waves. To help you achieve a natural stride, the Kiprun KN500 offer: - a reduced 4mm drop, - increased flexibility thanks to their flex grooves, - a very light weight (238 grams in size 42), - a low heel thickness. A natural stride is the stride we adopt when we run barefoot, striking the floor with the forefoot or middle of the foot (midfoot).

reviews.name: David Miller
reviews.comment: Excellent grip and comfort for running.

reviews.name: Sophia Turner
reviews.comment: Lightweight, but caused blisters on my feet.

products.title: Whey Protein Isolate
products.description: Proteins help maintain the muscle mass. 4gm of Fat in 100gm of powder. Mix 30 g of WHEY with 150 ml of water or skimmed milk in a shaker equipped with a strainer in order to obtain the desired texture. Shake for 30 seconds before drinking. The quick assimilation of WHEY protein is ideal for post-workout use. You can also supplement your diet by drinking a whey protein shake at breakfast. In addition to physical activity, it is important to maintain a varied, balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle.

reviews.name: Michael White
reviews.comment: Great flavor and mixes well.

reviews.name: Emma Carter

products.title: Elliptical Trainer - Cardio Pro
products.description: No need for an outlet: the 520 cross trainer is powered by your movements alone. 39 cm stride length and 15 resistance levels. Very smooth motion thanks to its 6 kg flywheel.
